property.name: Rules
property.value: {GATE OF MOONLESS NIGHT}: When you put a Magic Tool, you may choose 2 of your Magic Tools in the battle zone and your graveyard and summon this creature from your hand or graveyard onto those 4 cards for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever it attacks, destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. TWINPACT ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

property.value: {GATE OF MOONLESS NIGHT}: When you put a Magic Tool, you may choose 2 of your Magic Tools in the battle zone and your graveyard and summon this creature from your hand or graveyard onto those 4 cards for no cost. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When this creature attacks, destroy it after the attack. ■ When you use a "Gate of Moonless Night" ability, you may put this creature from your graveyard into the battle zone tapped.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.
